headline: Micromanaged Nightmare
cons: COO micromanages everything. Very little autonomy.

headline: Inefficient and  long hours
pros: You will learn good work ethic and technical skills to keep up with the workload.
cons:
-Very difficult place to work for
-Lots of office politics
-long long hours and extremely understaffed 
-lots of promises
- very inefficient
- they will take your comp back if you don't work here for 5 years

headline: Interesting Private Equity Fund Making Data Driven Decisions
pros: If you like technology, they are all for modernizing the investment approach.
cons: Like all private equity, it is a lot of work.
